this_title: The Boy Who Cried Bitch: The Adolescent Years
introduction: At it’s core, the story focuses around Steve, who upon reaching adulthood, is released from the mental health facility his un-milf of a mom sent him to. He returns back home, and brings the pain to ole Ma Dukes for the unjustice he feels he is subjected to. The entire movie we basically just watch this mustached asshole be shitty to women, steal from his mom, terrorize his mom, and boozing up his brothers, one of whom is a coked-up art student.
chinese_title: The Boy Who Cried Bitch: The Adolescent Years
